content: the brioche beanie the reversible brioche beanie is knitted in the round from the bottom up working with two colors in brioche stitches which makes the beanie reversible / double sided using techniques as cast on knitting in the round knitting with double pointed needles yarn over knitting and purling brioche stitches decreasing right and left in brioche cast off weaving in ends sizes s/m m/l s/m is made to fit a head circumference of approximately 54-57cm m/l is made to fit a head circumference of approximately 57-60 cm brioche stitches tends to widen out if you are in between sizes it is recommended to go for the smaller one yarn recommendations color 2 color 1 25 50 g of katia concept alapca silver 50 100 g of lana grossa cool wool or 50 50 g laying double of drops or 50 100 g drops baby merino brushed alpaca silk knitting gauge in brioche sts 17sts x 27r = 10cm x 10 cm materials abbreviations 3 5mm double pointed needles st s stitch es 4mm 40 cm circular needles k knit stitch markers 8 pcs p purl tapestry needle double_crochet-r/ double_crochet-l decrease right/ left elastic thread optional good to know in this project you knit brioche throughout the whole pattern the beginning of the round is where the colors are being changed when you change colors from 2 to 1 make sure that the yarn does not get tangled and that the last stitch in the round is purled with both the yarn over and the slipped stitch since the thread is loose because of the color changing it is easy that the yarn over doesn t get included if anything is unclear - please contact me on instagram @nanneknitwear 2 decreases double_crochet-r *k2tog including the yarn over slide the stitch back over on the left needle lift the second stitch on the left needle over the stitch that were slid back slip the stitch back on the right needle as if to purl* = 2 s decreased double_crochet-l *slip 1 stitch as if to knit k2tog including the yarn over lift the slipped stitch over* = 2 st decreased set up 1 cast on 80 88 stitches using color 1 on 4 mm circular needles 2 place a stitch marker at the beginning of the round 3 work as following * knit 1 make 1 yarn over slip 1 as if to purl * repeat from * - * until the end of the round beanie round 1 purl with color 2 slip marker add color 2 and work only with color 2 on this round as following * make 1 yarn over slip the stitch as if to purl purl the yarn over and the slipped stitch together * repeat from * - * until the end of the round round 2 knit with color 1 slip marker work as following * knit the yarn over and the slipped stitch together make 1 yarn over slip the stitch
